config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly single_input="${target_path}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 1 ]]; then
  echo 'Expecting single input' >&2
  exit 1
elif [[ "${#}" -eq 1 ]]; then
  readonly single_input="${1}"
else
  echo 'Expecting valid input or configuration' >&2
  exit 1
fi

case "${out_format}" in
  sha256) shasum --algorithm 256 "${single_input}" | cut -d ' ' -f1 | tr -d '\n';;
  sha512) shasum --algorithm 512 "${single_input}" | cut -d ' ' -f1 | tr -d '\n';;
  sha1) shasum --algorithm 1 "${single_input}" | cut -d ' ' -f1 | tr -d '\n';;
  md5) md5 -q "${single_input}" | tr -d '\n';;
  *) echo "Invalid algorithm: ${out_format}" >&2; exit 1;;
esac
taskDescription: Returns the cryptographic hash function of the passed-in file
